I'm going to talk about the power of a
word
Jihad to the vast majority of practicing

for the faith
it is a struggle within a struggle

written in the

and that's the reason why for hundreds

much as their sons in the same way that
say Christians name their daughters
Grace and Hindus my people name our
daughters bti which means in Sanskrit
spiritual

a small group a minority who believe
that Jihad is not only an internal

against forces that would threaten the

faithful and some of these people
believe that in that struggle it is
sometimes okay to take up
arms and so the thousands of young

but within that group a tiny smaller

Latin and he refined the idea his idea

and the things he did in the pursuit of

his definition of jihad began to gain

meaning he hoped that a name like that

Laden's idea of
jihad on Fridays in his mosque he gave

the
word but his
congregants the people who came to his

man small

why did you name your daughter your

Jihad why did you keep using the word

Americans what is your connection to AMA
bin
ladin so to the tunesian intelligence

it filled him with great
